channel.title: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik and Večer, 21–23 May 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 22.8–30.3%
  • Stranka modernega centra: 7.2–12.2%
  • Socialni demokrati: 11.6–17.6%
  • Levica: 5.7–10.3%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 4.8–9.0%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 6.2–10.9%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 0.9–3.2%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka: 1.2–3.7%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 1.6–4.4%
  • Glas za otroke in družine–Nova ljudska stranka Slovenije: 0.0–1.1%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 13.3–19.6%
